title: BEWITCHER's Standalone Single "The Warrior Trail" Hits Streaming Services
description: Previously released only as a flexi disc. The post BEWITCHER's Standalone Single "The Warrior Trail" Hits Streaming Services appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Previously released only as a flexi disc.
text: Bewitcher's exclusive Decibel Magazine flexi series single "The Warrior Trail" is finally available on all streaming services. If you need an extra rager to add to your playlists today, then you stream "The Warrior Trail" right here. "The Warrior Trail" was recorded during Bewitcher's latest sessions for their Spell Shock record, produced by Rancid's Lars Frederiksen. As Frederiksen previously commented on Spell Shock: "It's the best record I've ever produced for one of the best bands in the world." Bewitcher is bringing some speedy thrash metal to your town (or a town near you) thanks to a handful of upcoming US tour dates. The tour kicks off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA and features both Deathchant and Persekutor as support. Get those dates below and get your tickets here. 3/14 San Francisco, CA Bottom of the Hill3/15 Sacramento, CA Cafe Colonial3/16 San Diego, CA Brick by Bric3/17 Los Angeles, CA Lodge Room3/18 Phoenix, AZ Nile Undergrou (Bewitcher only)3/20 Houston, TX Hell's Heroes (Bewitcher only)3/21 Dallas, TX TX Tea Room3/22 Austin, TX The Ballroom3/23 Oklahoma City, OK 89th Street3/25 Kansas City, MO Record Bar3/26 Chicago, IL Reggie's3/27 Milwaukee, WI X-Ray Arcade3/28 St. Paul, MN Turf Club3/29 Fargo, ND Aquarium3/31 Denver, CO Hi-Dive4/2 Richland, WA Ray's Golden Lion (no Persekutor)4/3 Seattle, WA El Corazon (no Persekutor)4/5 Portland, OR Twilight Cafe & Bar (no Persekutor)5/17 Vancouver, BC Modified Ghost Fest (Bewitcher only) Want More Metal? html:
Bewitcher's exclusive Decibel Magazine flexi series single "The Warrior Trail" is finally available on all streaming services. If you need an extra rager to add to your playlists today, then you stream "The Warrior Trail" right here.

"The Warrior Trail" was recorded during Bewitcher's latest sessions for their Spell Shock record, produced by Rancid's Lars Frederiksen. As Frederiksen previously commented on Spell Shock: "It's the best record I've ever produced for one of the best bands in the world."

Bewitcher is bringing some speedy thrash metal to your town (or a town near you) thanks to a handful of upcoming US tour dates. The tour kicks off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA and features both Deathchant and Persekutor as support. Get those dates below and get your tickets here.

3/14 San Francisco, CA Bottom of the Hill
3/15 Sacramento, CA Cafe Colonial
3/16 San Diego, CA Brick by Bric
3/17 Los Angeles, CA Lodge Room
